name: Hardest Food And Drink 16 - Fruit Trivia Quiz | Fruit and Vegetables | 10 Questions

questions.text: What color is the concord grape?
What fruit is mentioned in the first verse of The Battle Hymn of the Republic?
How many real fruit juices are there in a can of Hawaiian Punch?
What is the most widely eaten fruit in America?
Which state grows the most oranges and grapefruit?
What natural poison is found in apple seeds?
A watermelon contains what percentage of water?
Apricots are native to what country?
Similar to apple cider what is the fermented drink made from pears called?
How old, in years, is a maiden fruit tree?
